transArray.content: The front desk service is attentive and the service is great! The wireless in the room is fast, the breakfast is fresh, the fruits are also very fresh, soy milk and fried dough sticks buns! The waiter also helped to deliver the luggage to the room. The room is also well soundproofed! The mattress is comfortable! !

Dear family, your satisfaction is refreshing because of the spring breeze and Buddha's face. Because of your satisfaction, we have the motivation to make unremitting efforts and make us make more progress.
